author: The Kudzu Wish
title: Volar
text: I'm a fan of aerodynamics/i could be a glorious pilot/if i were only given half a chance/if i were only given/half/of a chance/me gusta low wind resistance/my day will come/estudio mucho para el examen/i will pass the test/i will fly into the sunset/i will pass the test/i will fly into the sunset/me gusta low wind resistance/yo voy a volar muy lejos en mi avion
